Localization.Name: Klaus & Werner
Localization.Description: Formed in 2893, Klaus & Werner makes guns, and they make them well. This simple philosophy was the brainchild of Hector Klaus, a successful weapons inventor who believed above all else that simplicity of design would triumph in a combat situation.

English.Name: Klaus & Werner
English.Description: Formed in 2893, Klaus & Werner makes guns, and they make them well. This simple philosophy was the brainchild of Hector Klaus, a successful weapons inventor who believed above all else that simplicity of design would triumph in a combat situation.

Localization.Name: TS-35 Basara (3.5x Telescopic)
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Type: Telescopic
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 3x - 5.5x
Aim Time: +5%
Parallax: Low
Size: 2

The TS-35 Basara continues to expand on the high quality of the Basara series, by adding enhanced magnification to the sights, without compromising on quality.
